mapper.select: select sub.id as subjectId, sub.title as subjectTitle, spec.id as specializationId, spec.title as specializationTitle, step.id as stepId, step.title as stepTitle, #{pageable.pageSize} as pageSize, count(sub.id) over () as rows from public.subjects sub left join public.specializations spec on spec.id = sub.specialization_id left join public.steps step on spec.step_id = step.id where (#{searchText}::varchar is null or sub.title ilike concat('%', #{searchText}::varchar, '%')) and (#{stepId}::bigint is null or step.id = #{stepId}::bigint) and (#{specializationId}::bigint is null or spec.id = #{specializationId}::bigint) order by step.id, spec.id, sub.title offset #{pageable.offset} limit #{pageable.pageSize}
